title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: Datetime values retrieved from a table should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item. 2. Retrieve a datetime value from a table and display it in the text item. 3. Retrieve the same datetime value from the same table and display it in the data item and dynamic text item. 4. Compare the formats of the datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
